name: Trial of Fire (Kabungus)
description:
Pass the ultimate test for your magic skills. 

Face a terrifying ancient dragon in this magic shooter. 

Chose your spells wisely from your arsenal -

 and keep vigilant, the dungeon doesn't sleep.
